title: abc maker night
desc: Join us for a night to celebrate  the artists who make our world abc home's favorite artists gathered together in the holiday spirit of making with... Aviva Stanoff, on the art of dyeing Jason Ross , on the art of creating with leather? Beth Schaeffer from Bluma Project, on the art of jewelry making &  the art of global relationships Jessica Green from A Little Weather, on the art of weaving with a full loom demonstration? Red Flower, on the art of candlemaking abc visual team, on the art of flower arranging? Lucky Fish, on the art of screenprinting Samantha Verrone, on the art of recycling, rust-staining & creating with vintage linens Betty Kay Coakley from In Pursuit of Magic, on the art of creating magic? Kiva Motnyk, on the art of ecclectic quilting? Susan Eaton, on the art of off-the-grid traveling & global artisanship? exclusive artisan gifts available for the holidays ? plus, sacred home workshops, a holiday bar, and? much more... all workshops & demos on the mezzanine of abc home
